name: Theresa ERKENS and John Erkens, her husband, Appellants, v. C. Nicholas TREDENNICK, M.D.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
HUTCHINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Theresa ERKENS and John Erkens, her husband, Appellants, v. C. Nicholas TREDENNICK, M.D.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
HUTCHINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Leonard E. Price, Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellants.
Giles A. Gaea, John W. Jordan, IV, Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
531 A.2d 778
Theresa ERKENS and John Erkens, her husband, Appellants, v. C. Nicholas TREDENNICK, M.D.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 22, 1987.
Decided Oct. 8, 1987.
Leonard E. Price, Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellants.
Giles A. Gaea, John W. Jordan, IV, Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
